mapper.select: SELECT rownum as rank, b.item_id item_id,b.ITEM_IMG ITEM_IMG,b.ITEM_NAME ITEM_NAME,b.ITEM_PRICE ITEM_PRICE,b.ITEM_CONTENT ITEM_CONTENT FROM (select count(a.item_id) as cnt,b.item_id,b.ITEM_IMG,b.ITEM_NAME,b.ITEM_PRICE,b.ITEM_CONTENT from orderdetail a left outer join item b ON a.item_id = b.item_id group by b.item_id,b.ITEM_IMG,b.ITEM_NAME,b.ITEM_PRICE,b.ITEM_CONTENT order by cnt desc ) b where rownum < 5

SELECT rownum as rank, b.item_id item_id,b.ITEM_IMG ITEM_IMG,b.ITEM_NAME ITEM_NAME,b.ITEM_PRICE ITEM_PRICE,b.ITEM_CONTENT ITEM_CONTENT FROM (select count(a.item_id) as cnt,b.item_id,b.ITEM_IMG,b.ITEM_NAME,b.ITEM_PRICE,b.ITEM_CONTENT from orderdetail a left outer join item b ON a.item_id = b.item_id where b.category_id IN (100, 200) group by b.item_id,b.ITEM_IMG,b.ITEM_NAME,b.ITEM_PRICE,b.ITEM_CONTENT order by cnt desc ) b where rownum < 5

SELECT rownum as rank, b.item_id item_id,b.ITEM_IMG ITEM_IMG,b.ITEM_NAME ITEM_NAME,b.ITEM_PRICE ITEM_PRICE,b.ITEM_CONTENT ITEM_CONTENT FROM (select count(a.item_id) as cnt,b.item_id,b.ITEM_IMG,b.ITEM_NAME,b.ITEM_PRICE,b.ITEM_CONTENT from orderdetail a left outer join item b ON a.item_id = b.item_id where b.category_id IN (300, 400) group by b.item_id,b.ITEM_IMG,b.ITEM_NAME,b.ITEM_PRICE,b.ITEM_CONTENT order by cnt desc ) b where rownum < 5

SELECT rownum as rank, b.SUBSITEM_ID SUBSITEM_ID,b.SUBSITEM_NAME SUBSITEM_NAME,b.SUBSITEM_PRICE SUBSITEM_PRICE,b.SUBSITEM_CONTENT SUBSITEM_CONTENT,b.SUBSITEM_IMG SUBSITEM_IMG,b.SUBSITEM_CNT SUBSITEM_CNT FROM (select count(a.SUBSITEM_ID) as cnt,b.SUBSITEM_ID,b.SUBSITEM_NAME,b.SUBSITEM_PRICE,b.SUBSITEM_CONTENT,b.SUBSITEM_IMG,b.SUBSITEM_CNT from subsinfo a left outer join subsitem b ON a.SUBSITEM_ID= b.SUBSITEM_ID group by b.SUBSITEM_ID,b.SUBSITEM_NAME,b.SUBSITEM_PRICE,b.SUBSITEM_CONTENT,b.SUBSITEM_IMG,b.SUBSITEM_CNT order by cnt desc) b where rownum < 4
